bot.name: Protection Code
start.welcome: ğŸ‘‹ Hello {first_name}! Use /panel in private to manage groups.
start.private.welcome: ğŸ‘‹ Welcome to {bot_name}! ğŸ¤– About This Bot I'm a professional Telegram group management bot designed to help administrators maintain order and automate group tasks. âœ¨ Key Features â€¢ Advanced moderation tools (warn, mute, ban) â€¢ Anti-spam protection â€¢ Welcome messages & rules management â€¢ Content filtering & blacklists â€¢ Automated announcements â€¢ Join request handling â€¢ And much more! ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’» Developer Created by: Al-Tamimi ğŸ“¢ Updates Channel Stay updated: @codei8 ğŸ’¡ Getting Started 1. Add me to your group 2. Make me an admin 3. Use /help to see available commands For group management, use /panel
help.text: Use /panel in DM to manage groups you admin. In groups, admins can use /warn, /mute, /ban, /purge, /rules.
help.title: Commands
help.tip.add_bot: â€¢ Add me to your group as admin
help.tip.use_panel: â€¢ Use /panel to manage your groups
help.tip.panel_private: â€¢ Use /panel in private for full control
help.tip.welcome: â€¢ Set welcome messages and rules
help.private: ğŸ“š Bot Commands Private Chat Commands: /start - Welcome message /panel - Group management panel /help - This help message /privacy - Privacy policy Group Admin Commands: /warn @user - Warn a user /unwarn @user - Remove warnings /mute @user [time] - Mute a user /unmute @user - Unmute a user /ban @user - Ban a user /unban @user - Unban a user /purge - Delete messages /rules - Show group rules /setrules - Set group rules /settings - Open settings panel Bot Owner Commands: /bot - Bot admin panel /backup - Create database backup ğŸ’¡ Tips: â€¢ Make me admin with all permissions â€¢ Use /panel in private to configure groups â€¢ Set up anti-spam and welcome messages ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’» Developer: Al-Tamimi ğŸ“¢ Updates: @codei8

privacy.policy: ğŸ”’ Privacy Policy What We Store â€¢ Group settings and configurations only â€¢ No personal messages are stored â€¢ No user data is collected Data Usage â€¢ Settings are used to manage group features â€¢ No data is sold or shared with third parties â€¢ Data is deleted when bot is removed from group Security â€¢ All data transmissions are encrypted â€¢ Access is restricted to bot operations only Contact For any concerns, contact the developer: ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’» Developer: @codei8 Last updated: January 2025
